name: Piquant Bathing
description:
In order to enjoy the view of the girl, solve puzzles and unlock the image by connecting the dots. If you do everything right, you will see something piquant: hot beauties in the bath, in the foam, in the shower ... Your imagination has already played out? Hurry, start the game!Game features
  • Bright connect puzzle with hot beauties
  • Squares with different levels of difficulty
  • Embodiment of the most turbulent fantasies: girls in wet T-shirts, in the foam and in the shower!
